text: Skin Deep is a 1989 American romantic comedy movie directed by Blake Edwards and starring John Ritter, Chelsea Field, Vincent Gardenia, Alyson Reed, Joel Brooks, Julianne Phillips, Nina Foch, Denise Crosby, Peter Donat. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1989 romantic comedy movies Category:1980s sex comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Blake Edwards
title: Skin Deep (1989 movie)
